original_text: King Eglon made an agreement with the Ammonites and the Amalekites to join together to attack Israel. They attacked Jericho, ‘The City of Palm Trees’, and they took it for themselves.
korean_text: 에글론이 암몬과 아말렉 자손들을 모아 가지고 와서 이스라엘을 쳐서 종려나무 성읍을 점령한지라

sentences.original_text: with the Ammonites and the Amalekites
to join together to attack Israel
and they took it for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그것을 자신들을 위해 차지했습니다
